// lib.rs (ê³ ì •) #[wasm_bindgen]
pub fn run_tests() -> String {
use user_code::square;

    let mut result = String::new();
    if square(2) == 4 {
        result += "âœ… Passed test 1\n";
    } else {
        result += "âŒ Failed test 1\n";
    }

    if square(-3) == 9 {
        result += "âœ… Passed test 2\n";
    } else {
        result += "âŒ Failed test 2\n";
    }

    result

}
